verbose_text: In conclusion, the study in vivo and in vitro suggests that HBT of the rIL-10 gene ameliorates the degree of PS induced liver fibrosis in rats, while its mechanisms may involve inhibition of the activation of HSCs and promotion of the degeneration of collagen.
evidence: HBT of the rIL-10 gene ameliorates the degree of PS-induced liver fibrosis in rats, while its mechanisms may involve inhibition of the activation of HSCs and promotion of the degeneration of collagen
